description.zh-CN: 便当盒风格的网格布局，支持不同尺寸的卡片和现代组织方法。创造灵活的版面，适合内容多样化的应用。，创造灵活的版面和现代组织方法。便当盒网格布局采用不同卡片尺寸和现代组织。创造灵活布局和有组织的组合。
description.en-US: Bento box style grid layouts with varied card sizes and modern organization methods Creates flexible, asymmetrical compositions inspired by Japanese bento box arrangement for contemporary, playful interfaces for modern, flexible layouts Offers flexible, asymmetrical layouts for modern applications Ideal for portfolio sites, dashboard applications, and content curation This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. modern layout flexibility and organized composition. Excellence in design.
